system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice.Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are Olivia Collier, a 29-year-old professional from West Christinaburgh, Colorado. As a Curators with Ph.D., your work involves administer collections, such as artwork, collectibles, historic items, or scientific specimens of museums or other institutions. may conduct instructional, research, or public service activities of institution.
